Articles.Content:
...im looking for someone to battle. Care to duel my fleet?

Have at thee!

I may only have one ship, but that one ship is an unholy and nearly invincible death machine with 52 missiles.

The fleet should be done by the end of today.

EDIT: Actually, that one ship is essentially a bunch of guns stuck together with some armor plating, and a lot of smaller guns on the armor plating.

Edited October 1, 2013 by Shadow Lane

canceling post

Edited October 1, 2013 by War Eagle 1
decided to pm instead

I may only have one ship, but that one ship is an unholy and nearly invincible death machine with 52 missiles.

The fleet should be done by the end of today.

EDIT: Actually, that one ship is essentially a bunch of guns stuck together with some armor plating, and a lot of smaller guns on the armor plating.

lol interesting... we will see how invincible it is

Say, three of your ships vs three of mine

What class? Honestly, I don't know what class to put a ship of this particular... Style, into.

Edited October 1, 2013 by Shadow Lane
My ships are 70-80 tons, but they're tough as nails, the dam buggers
Speaking of which, perhaps we should host fights based on tonnage, making lighter ships like fighters more prolific than dreadnoughts.

well what we try to do is do it by tonnage, but try to keep number of ships equal as well. how heavy are your ships?

EDIT Hey Spartwo i have a little competition for your bayonets...

Edited October 1, 2013 by zekes
How do I measure the weight? Is there a plugin for this, or do I just have to add it up?

How do I measure the weight? Is there a plugin for this, or do I just have to add it up?

Take control of the ship you want to weigh. hit "M" to go to map mode. There's a small button shaped like a letter "i" on the right side of the screen. Hit that button for weight and parts count.

only problem is time is a rare commodity and I suck at making large crafts great at small one though.

Don't underestimate fighters.

If either of you want to join claim a planet,pick a colour,and beat the daylights out of one another.

PS:that docking took almost an hour due to the lack of rcs.

PS:that docking took almost an hour due to the lack of rcs.

HAHA

I still have a few tricks up my sleeve. Even if I lose, I wont go quietly.

A little over 509 Tons.

This ship is a prototype, and is messily constructed, if the system proves it's worth, I'll produce a second, properly constructed, version.

EDIT: Please realize that the ship is designed to split apart upon engagement, and that the plating is little more than a warhead.

A little over 509 Tons.

This ship is a prototype, and is messily constructed, if the system proves it's worth, I'll produce a second, properly constructed, version.

EDIT: Please realize that the ship is designed to split apart upon engagement, and that the plating is little more than a warhead.

so where's the ship?

well what we try to do is do it by tonnage, but try to keep number of ships equal as well. how heavy are your ships?

EDIT Hey Spartwo i have a little competition for your bayonets...

*Sickle*I experimented with an E varient *searches through recycling bin*By comparison they have 3 times the range but are 50% heavier and have a TWR 20 times lower.It can't even run on full,So the LO varient seemed the best option for orbital operations.

EDIT:might come back to it with the new .5m parts

Edited October 1, 2013 by Spartwo
I got my charger back so I ll play my next (hopefully not last) move when I get home

here is what remains of Delta

Spartwo you have been a very formidable opponent. I hope you can say the same for me.

unfortunately you wont like where I moved to
Looks to me like Delta is still alive. Watch out!

Looks to me like Delta is still alive. Watch out!

It has no missiles and no engines so what would be the point

however there is a glitch where when I would go back to space center it would delete the last ship i was in control of and it was delta so it got deleted. IDK why that happened.

Was hoping you would take them(wish I could have 2)

Where did you go?Is it within 5k?

Delta was gone after the second hit I would have immediately ended the flight.Don't forget alpha:)
